posts.post_text: July 25, 2014 at 11:26 AM#2Hi Jim,I'am pretty sure this will not work because, align is a programming function, second point is that the release of a button can not be used as "trigger", its just releasing the executor and its content

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: July 25, 2014 at 3:49 PM#3the only way to make the release of a button trigger something is to use DMX-remotescreate two dummychannels, one with defaultvalue 0, the second with defaultvalue 100,create a temp button that sets ch1 to 100 and ch2 to zero, and set up dmx-remotes for ch1 (press) and ch2 (release).

posts.author: RoodLD
posts.post_text: July 25, 2014 at 7:10 PM#4This works great!!  Thank you.No need for the (press) remote trigger.  Only need the (release) Remote trigger.I have exec button 1.101 as temp with cue that has dummy 1 @ 100 and Dummy 2 @ 0 with Align <> macro in cmd.  When i release the temp button it resets the dummy channel and triggers another seq on page 999 that has the macro in in for OFF align.Works great!!  Thanks again.Jim RoodLighting Designer/ Programmerhttp://www.jimrood.comjprood@gmail.com
